description:
Dominic is a guy I've been wanting to film for a while. I had met him out on the town a few months ago, but job commitments and his girlfriend (grrr!) just kept him too busy.
But I'm persistent and eventually I was able to schedule a shoot with him. I really enjoyed working with Dominic because he's open and very comfortable with himself.
In his interview, he makes reference to being an ex-professional athlete. Check out his form on the field!
title: Dominic
